publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3439 Brian Adam: A Real Community Fundâ€”That the Parliament calls on the Scottish Executive to consider creating a real Community Fund to allow community groups to directly receive funding for projects that will enhance community activities and facilities in neighbourhoods throughout Scotland.
S2M-3439 A Real Community Fund (lodged on 21 October 2005) Mark Ballard*, John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-3439 A Real Community Fund (lodged on 21 October 2005) Shiona Baird*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
